items.name: Emily Carter

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about our AI Logo Generator

items.title: What kind of logos can I create?
items.description: You can create logos for any type of business or brand, from tech startups to artisanal shops. The AI adapts to your style and industry preferences.

items.title: Is there a cost to use the logo generator?
items.description: Yes! While we offer a free trial, continued access to additional features and high-res downloads requires a subscription.

items.title: Can I edit my logo after it's generated?
items.description: Absolutely! You can customize colors, fonts, and other elements after generating your logo.

items.title: What rights do I have to the generated logos?
items.description: All users retain full ownership and rights to any logos they generate, allowing for commercial use.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Your Own Logo?
footer.description: Start using our AI Logo Generator and see your ideas come to life. No sign-up required.
